job_tasks.phrase: The team handles complex challenges and works on innovative and often AI focused projects while controlling and directing other engineering teams, external partners and stakeholders.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the general work of the team, which involves managing projects and directing other teams, indicating a software engineering focus on project execution and coordination.

job_tasks.phrase: The role is essential in providing our audience a great experience every time they open the VIX app and will be key to developing industry-leading reliability, quality, and performance.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the focus on building and maintaining user-facing applications with a strong emphasis on reliability, quality, and performance, which are core software engineering concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop software.
job_tasks.justification: This is a fundamental software development task, emphasizing the creation and building of software.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work on all aspects of software development including front-end, back-end, database management, and other integrations.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly lists core software development activities across the full stack, including integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, the 'research, prototype, and build' aspect, especially in an R&D context, can encompass model development, but it's more general software engineering unless specified.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions AI/ML driven systems, understanding video, and using Vector databases and LLMs, which points to AI specialization tasks, particularly in data handling and model application.

job_tasks.phrase: Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
job_tasks.justification: This describes innovation and rapid prototyping, which is common in R&D for both software and AI/ML model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on the integration of prototypes into large-scale applications, a core software engineering task.

soft_skills.phrase: You dive headfirst into challenges and have a problem-solving mentality.
You are comfortable with failing often and fast on the road towards a solution.
You evangelize software craftsmanship and operational excellence yet pragmatic to know when to incur technical debt versus 'doing it right'.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase, while containing 'operational excellence', is framed within the context of software development practices and pragmatism in managing technical debt, aligning with software engineering principles.

soft_skills.phrase: You are confident yet humble enough to change your mind when new information presents itself.
You value open communication and are willing to give and receive feedback.
You are a self-starter, flexible and can adjust to shifting priorities.

profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that involves significant software development (front-end, back-end, integration, prototyping, large-scale applications) which falls under Macro-Category A. Crucially, it also explicitly mentions working with 'AI/ML driven systems', 'Vector databases', and 'LLM's', indicating tasks within Macro-Category B that are specific to Generative AI. The balance of core software engineering with specific GenAI tasks, and the mention of R&D and innovation in this space, points towards the 'Core GenAI Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines both core software engineering responsibilities and specific AI/ML tasks involving GenAI technologies like LLMs and vector databases. The R&D context also supports the innovative aspect. While some phrases are broad, the explicit mention of GenAI technologies makes the classification reasonably confident. A score of 5 would require even more specific details on the *type* of AI/ML tasks within the GenAI domain.
